Returns: A custom View that will be managed by WebView.
getEmbeddedView(int,android.content.Cont.Description: Return a custom embedded view to draw the plugin.
getEmbeddedView(int,android.content.Cont.FullName: public abstract View getEmbeddedView (int NPP, Context context)

Returns: A custom View that will be managed by WebView.
getEmbeddedView(int, android.content.Con.Description: Return a custom embedded view to draw the plugin.
getEmbeddedView(int, android.content.Con.FullName: public abstract View getEmbeddedView (int NPP, Context context)

Returns: A custom View that will be managed by the application.
getFullScreenView(int,android.content.Co.Description: Return a custom full-screen view to be displayed when the user requests a plugin display as full-screen. Note that the application may choose not to display this View as completely full-screen.
getFullScreenView(int,android.content.Co.FullName: public abstract View getFullScreenView (int NPP, Context context)

Returns: A custom View that will be managed by the application.
getFullScreenView(int, android.content.C.Description: Return a custom full-screen view to be displayed when the user requests a plugin display as full-screen. Note that the application may choose not to display this View as completely full-screen.
getFullScreenView(int, android.content.C.FullName: public abstract View getFullScreenView (int NPP, Context context)

ClassDesc: This interface is used to implement plugins in a WebView. A plugin package may extend this class and implement the abstract functions to create embedded or fullscreeen views displayed in a WebView. The PluginStub implementation will be provided the same NPP instance that is created through the native interface.
